item.title: Chapter 1 - Part 1
item.description: CHAPTER 1 A MOST DESPAIR FILLED GAME CHAPTER 01 This... this is unbelievable. Someone’s got to be pulling my leg here.Maybe it’s me. Maybe this is all one big demented dream.If it is, I’d do anything to wake up right now.As I triedto put my fragmented thoughts into words, something trickled down my spine.A familiar tingling sensation......Goosebumps. There were goosebumps all over my body. CHAPTER 01 I switch off the tablet and look up from where I’m sitting.
